borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

<p>Notwithstanding the provisions of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no development falling within CLASS B in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to that Order shall be carried out without the prior written permission of the Local Planning Authority.<br></p>

<p><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:&quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif">Any
upper-floor window located in a wall or roof slope forming a side elevation of
the dwelling house shall be obscure-glazed, and non-opening unless the parts of
the window which can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the
room in which the window is installed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p>Any use of the dwelling hereby permitted for purposes other than those of paragraph (a) of Class C3 of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) is subject to approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority.</p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>- DRAWING: SITE LOCATION PLAN<br>- DRAWING: PROPOSED PLANS - ZAAVIA/97LG/302 - ISSUE: A - DATED: 24 DECEMBER 2020<br>- DRAWING: PROPOSED SITE PLAN - ZAAVIA/97LG/308 - ISSUE: A - DATED: 24 DECEMBER 2020<br>- DRAWING: ROOF PLANS - ZAAVIA/97LG/306 - ISSUE: B - DATED: 16 FEBRUARY 2021<br>- DRAWING: PROPOSED ELEVATIONS - ZAAVIA/97LG/304 - ISSUE: B - DATED: 16 FEBRUARY 2021<br>- DRAWING: SECTION AA - ZAAVIA/97LG/305 - ISSUE: B - DATED: 16 FEBRUARY 2021<br>- DRAWING: LOFT PLANS - ZAAVIA/97LG/309 - ISSUE: A - DATED: 16 FEBRUARY 2021</p><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
description:
Construction of a two storey side extension and
part two storey part single storey rear extension including the installation of
a roof lantern, rear dormer and three front roof lights, following demolition
of existing single storey side and rear extension (part retrospective).
